item.title: CVE-2024-24759|2024-09-05T16:30:38.659Z -- mindsdb -- mindsdb
item.description: MindsDB is a platform for building artificial intelligence from enterprise data. Prior to version 23.12.4.2, a threat actor can bypass the server-side request forgery protection on the whole website with DNS Rebinding. The vulnerability can also lead to denial of service. Version 23.12.4.2 contains a patch.
